Sammamish.Lake Sammamish State Park: Lake Sammamish State Park is a park at the south end of Lake Sammamish, in King County, Washington, United States. The park is administered by the Washington State Park System. The park covers an area of 512 acres (0.80 sq mi) and has 6,858 feet (2,090 m) of waterfront and is known for its boating and watersport activities, such as waterskiing.
